name: Feridas de Guerra (Wounds of War)
description:
Relive the memories

In the 1960s, thousands of Portuguese soldiers found themselves fighting a war that many didn't understand or agree with. Why were they fighting so far away from home? Why did they have to put their lives on hold to fight in a conflict that meant nothing to them?

In "Feridas de Guerra (Wounds of War)", you'll witness some of the events of the Portuguese Colonial War from the perspective of the people that were closest to them, from soldiers to some of the people supporting these men. 

Features
  • Voice-acted dialogue in Portuguese, subtitled in English
  • Period-accurate props and music
  • Visuals inspired by photographs from the Portuguese Colonial War
